abstract: In India, Rajat K. Gupta's fall from grace has inspired everything from soul-searching to conspiracy theories to folksy explanations of the charges, Vikas Bajaj and Heather Timmons of The New York Times report in the India Ink blog.

headline.main: Once Revered, Gupta Has Lost His Luster
